Name: Root Builder
Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder, not just the Data folder.
Author: Kezyma

Name: Reinstaller
Description: Reinstaller allows you to conveninetly backup mod installers to re-run later, without risk of them cluttering up your downloads section in Mod Organizer 2.
Author: Kezyma

Name: Shortcutter
Description: Shortcutter gives you the option of quickly creating instance and profile specific desktop shortcuts, allowing you to quickly launch your game without having to manually switch inside Mod Organizer.
Author: Kezyma

Name: Plugin Finder
Description: A plugin for finding an installing other Mod Organizer plugins.
Author: Kezyma

Name: Orphaned Script Extender Save Deleter Plugin
Description: Mod Organizer plugin to delete orphaned script extender co-saves.
Author: AnyOldName3

Name: ModOrganizer-to-OpenMW
Description: A Mod Organizer plugin to export your VFS, plugin selection and load order to OpenMW.
Author: AnyOldName3

Name: Merge Plugin Hide & Sync Mod Order
Description: Hide/unhide plugins that were merged using Merge Plugins or zMerge & Sync mod order from current profile to another.
Author: deorder

Name: Conflict Deleter
Description: Moves overwritten files in the current mod order to a backup mod to improve Mod Organizer performance.
Author: LostDragonist

Name: Fix Game Registry Key
Description: When running an application in MO2, this will check to make sure the registry key is correct according to the game being managed by MO2.
Author: LostDragonist

Name: Game Redirector
Description: This plugin maps certain game files for some games to the game files used by other games.
Author: LostDragonist

Name: LOOT Preventifier
Description: This plugins prevents the user from running 'LOOT.exe' or 'lootcli.exe' executables through MO2.
Author: LostDragonist

Name: Root Linker
Description: Manage the files in your base game folder, such as ENB and Bodyslide files.
Author: Vaneixus

Name: Grass Precacher
Description: A MO2 tool plugin that simplifies the precaching of grass on Skyrim Special Edition when using No Grass in Objects.
Author: Al12rs

Name: Sync Plugins with Mod Order
Description: A simple plugin for Mod Organizer 2 to sync the order of the Plugins in the right pane to the order of Mods in the left pane.
Author: Coldrifting

Name: Broom - The Loose File Sweeper
Description: MO2/Vortex plugin that allows you to hide or delete files from other mods based on a configuration kept in your modlist.
Author: mihaifm

Name: LOOT Warning Checker
Description: Mod Organizer 2 plugin to check for LOOT warnings and display them as notifications, without needing to sort the load order.
Author: JonathanFeenstra
